item.title: Musiq Soulchild - Yes
item.description:
Let me get this out
the way
So there ain’t
no complications
Later on
for us no
Look I know things
don’t stay the same
People grow
and seasons change
But
when it comes to love
Don’t you
feel like
You ever gotta
worry about
My feelings changing
for you
All the time
‘cause when I say
I’m here girl
I mean it
So
when the world
And the odds are
against us
You won’t have
to question
The answer is
yes
When 2 or 3 years
from now
You start having
some doubts
About
if this love will last

yes

you’re beautiful
‘Cause I’m
more attracted to
What’s
inside of you

to guess

yes

all I care

your happiness

yes

item.title: Musiq Soulchild - Waiting Still
item.description:
I picture
you in your red dress
Looking so perfect
everyone’s asking you
Where is
your boyfriend
And then you
explain
I’m somewhere
off on a plane
Or in some other city
even wondering
How he’s
so lucky
I will give you all
I have of my time
Even though girl
every second passing
You’re
on my mind
‘Cause the only thing
I know for sure
Is where I was
the day before
But I promise that
this much is true
I do it for you
I do it for us
I do it so one day
we can turn this love
Into a house
and a home
Where you won’t ever
have to be alone
And I promise you
I’ll make it I will
I hope
you’re waiting still
I picture
you on a park bench oh
Reading
your favorite oh book
And they looking
asking you
If you’re talking
you say

and “Love madly truly”

if I was by your side

I have of my time

every second passing

‘Cause the only thing

item.title: 정키,Musiq Soulchild - My Girl
item.description:
The very first time
I saw you
Still runs
through my mind
And all
I can see is you
Because of you
I find myself restless
Feel like it’s not me
anymore
I never knew
that I could love
Someone so much
my girl
Sometimes I swear
that you’ll leave me
Maybe
it’s just a dream
And I even doubt
that you are real
I doubt if you have
someone like me
I doubt if you have
them around you
I hate to be
one of those
I hope to be
the one for you
Babe I love you
why it’s so hard
To come
and just say this
What would you say
it makes me wonder
Cuz all that time
I spent with you
My feelings have
grown
But
you will never know
You don’t have
any clue clue
It’s not
just some game
You’ve heard
before
It’s nothing
like an old cliche
Can someone please
tell me what to say
I never want you
to get me wrong
Don’t wanna hurt you
my baby no
I hope
that you feel like me
What if you feel
just like me
(Babe I love you
why it’s so hard
To come
and just say this)
I don’t think
I can take
What you might say
I wonder
All all this time
I spent with you
My my feelings
have grown
But you will
never know never know
I get so weak
with butterflies
When I’m comin’ up
to you
But I can’t stop now
can someone tell me
What should I do
if she hesitates
One more step close
I’ll get to you
Stay
where you are my baby
(I want you to
be my girl stay baby)
That’s all
I ask of you
(You’re the only one
I care for
The one that I adore
I feel like it’s time
I should
let you know that
Babe
I love you)
I’m not perfect
but I’m so true
My heart
you’ll listen
My girl my girl
my girl
You are the only one
true love
My dear
my girl

item.title: Musiq Soulchild - Just Friends (Sunny)
item.description:
Girl I know this might
seem strange

if I’m out of order

See I’ve been watching

let you know
That I’m really

give me yours too

‘cause

thinkin’ ‘bout you

gotta be my girlfriend

some time
